website_summaries.verdict: Doesn’t transform into individual Zords, and its lack of detail and articulation make it not quite worth its price point.
pros: Very large and durable, with 5 Ranger figures included that fit into specific compartments
Well balanced, it stands on its own
Exciting features like expanding wings, lights and sounds
cons: Figure’s cockpits for the 5 included mini-characters are hard to open
doesn’t bend at the knees or turn at the waist
Mini-figures tend to fall apart after some hours of play

customer_reviews.title: My sons happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving 4 out of 5 stars is because this is based on first impressions straight out the box. My son is very happy with this toy. He chose it because he wanted a Power Ranger toy and this one is a Megazord with all 5 Rangers. I guess he liked the way it looked compared the the other options. Batteries are included and it makes sounds and has a few phrases. The package arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Boddiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to fit in the compartments & perfect size ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has a real hard time opening some of the little compartments. He brings it to me to open & I have broken at least 3-4 nails opening them, or attempting to open. I don't know if it is just ours or if it is awkwardly made or what, but we rarely get it open on the 1st, or 5th try. The little Power Rangers that come with it are cheaply made & are probably about 1 1/2 inches tall. Perfect size to fit in the compartments & perfect size to lose quickly or get eaten by a family pet, if left lying around because you can't get the daggum compartment open to put them back up!
customer_reviews.author: kryscott99

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved It! This toy is so much bigger then ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend of mine son's birthday. He absolutely loved It! This toy is so much bigger then what I originally thought. It comes with all of the little power rangers and they fit inside of him in various spots. It seems well made and not cheap so it won t break easily. It's well worth the money. I'm thinking about buying it for my boys!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: So, my son is 5 and every single time we go to the store he wants an action figure. I typically do not pay this much for toys, but he practically begged for this! With an upcoming birthday I gave in on this purchase and it was SO worth it! It’s constructed well, not flimsy at all. The thing is huge! The sounds aren’t too annoying if he plays while I’m watching tv, which is a plus. He has spent hours on end playing with it and loves showing anyone that comes over how there are actual rangers inside the compartments. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Reesie

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: My sons grandmother had me buy this for her for him, for his Christmas gift (way to show me up mom, lol) and he loved it he plays with it more than anything else. and i was pleasantly surprising to find out that it had recordings of some of the character sayings and sound effects in the movie
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper Yen

customer_reviews.title: Besides the box it's in being a little beat up from its travel I'm guessing the toy itself looks great! Can't wait to see his face when he ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought it for my nephews birthday that I missed because he looooves Power Rangers. I received it today and by my surprise it is LARGE! I wasn't expecting it to be so big, mostly because I neglected to read the description in my haste to find him something for my visit next week, and now I'm thinking of buying another for my own son! Besides the box it's in being a little beat up from its travel I'm guessing the toy itself looks great! Can't wait to see his face when he opens it Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Likely

customer_reviews.title: Robust product, great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: The product is well detailed and matches the product from the movies. Contains smaller components, Power Rangers that would be harmful to small children. Fit and function are good and the product delivery timing was perfect, when ordered at the last minute for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Grill-baby

customer_reviews.title: Almost an epic fail
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kiddo I opened the box just enough to see what was inside wrapped it and stuck it under the tree, Christmas morning I saved this “big” presents for last because it’s what he NEEDED (lol) for Christmas it was damaged and missing a wing. He was sad till big sister told him it looked better with out it and he’s fine ish I didn’t realize it would be missing a wing or I wouldn’t have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beware: It's a LARGE toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, but wow is it big! It feels sturdy and good quality. The compartments in the arms are a bit hard for my son to open by himself, but overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Wong

customer_reviews.title: Wings fall off
customer_reviews.text: My kids were excited to get this guy! But then his wings fell off every couple minutes. They quickly put it down and it went into toy box graveyard. Definitely would have loved it if that hadn't happened though.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Small power rangers
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if there are little kids in your house because the toy is huge but the power rangers are tiny. For my 4 year old it is great he loves it and it makes cool noises when he plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation, I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is HUGE. I was so impressed and my nephew's eyes got so big. Yeah, expensive, but worth it cause it has great presentation.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaS

customer_reviews.title: ... ranger guys were very small but overall it looks good and I think will please my grandson once he ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 because the power ranger guys were very small but overall it looks good and I think will please my grandson once he opens it up for his birthday! I will see how he plays with it and how durable it is for a five year old and if not good will let you know. ;o)
customer_reviews.author: San J Rangel

customer_reviews.title: ... than I thought it would be and of an excellent quality. It is usually the reverse so it ...
customer_reviews.text: This Megazord is even bigger than I thought it would be and of an excellent quality. It is usually the reverse so it was a nice change to have something that was nicely built that can withstand the rough handling my son will subject it to.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price this toy is ok. Not much for moving parts. After my son playes with it for 10 minutes one of the wings stopped working. It looks cool, the sound effects and lights is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Reed's

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 yr old son and he loves it. Although the little figures are very tiny and easy to loose, he still enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Big Wave

customer_reviews.title: It pretty much does nothing but make some cool noises
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! Was so excited for my son to get this for Christmas, we took it out of the packaging and started playing with it. One of the lights on the bottom of the foot does not work. The compartments that hold the small rangers are almost impossible for little hand to open and the wings barely move. It pretty much does nothing but make some cool noises. Very disappointed in item. My son still likes it so that I guess that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My son wanted it for Christmas and it looks awesome and is really big but the little power rangers ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted it for Christmas and it looks awesome and is really big but the little power rangers that go inside of him are SO tiny they got lost within a week so depends on how responsible your kid is but that's the only small parts that can get lost, other than that it's rock solid and it doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: and has a lot of cool features.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old for his birthday and he absolutely loves it! It lights up, makes noise, and has a lot of cool features.
customer_reviews.author: C Jennings

customer_reviews.title: My 4yo loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It is bigger than I expected, but not too big. He loves all the compartments for the power rangers. The power rangers are a little small and some of the compartments are hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4yr old, as a mom im really not into boy toys....but this is just too cool. A must for any boy, power ranger lover or not!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Practically Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Yes! So much yes! I don't know who loves this more, my 5 year old or me. New toys often are cheaper quality these days, but not this megazord. Probably one of the best things I've bought in the last 2 years. Such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday boy loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift, so don't know about quality. I do know the birthday boy was very excited to receive it and started playing with this and his other new Power Rangers Megazord figures right away. Shipping was quick, as anticipated. The toy was wrapped well for shipping and arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn in EVV

customer_reviews.title: Lights up, makes noise, and tiny rangers get lost easily....whats not for kids to love
customer_reviews.text: The big dude isn't in a box he is open in the front so his face was a bit scuffed. The little power ranger fellows are really really small. The couch ate them twice already.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: I will recomend this one at all my ftiends.
customer_reviews.text: this item was a gift for my 2 grandchildren and its look like they love it much and mo comment.

customer_reviews.title: This is a big one!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old son's birthday is tomorrow - so we haven't seen his reaction yet...but we were SHOCKED at the size. Yes, it is listed but we didn't look at it - be sure you do because it is LARGE! Arrived safely and looks in good condition - should make a real impact on his day!
customer_reviews.author: DANA C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow factor 👍
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was super excited when he unwrapped the gift! Talk about wow factor! He was quite happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: A fan of classics,

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cool!
customer_reviews.text: It looks more like a stand alone Japanese Superhero than a Megazord.. which I like. all the moving parts work great and the electronic sounds and lights add to the play value. Great toy!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little brother loves it! He wouldn't go to sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: SKY LLOYD

customer_reviews.title: This toys is tons of fun. The only downside is that the little power ...
customer_reviews.text: This toys is tons of fun. The only downside is that the little power rangers are easy to loose and can fall out of their hiding spots.Besides that, this has been a hit :)
customer_reviews.author: patrick n.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As good as depicted. Was a Christmas gift for my son he loves it.. looks magnificent

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a boy or girl
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves this toy. My 3 year old daughter also loves it. She would take all the little power ranger figurine and run or hide if my son does not agree to share it. Great material. Made well.

customer_reviews.title: Megazord
customer_reviews.text: The ranger figurines are very tiny. Personally I would rate this item a 3 but it was for my son and he absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is obsessed. It’s awesome it came with batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool! Lights up and makes noises with interactive features
customer_reviews.text: Really cool! Lights up and makes noises with interactive features. Son loves to play with it while watching the movie.

customer_reviews.title: Epic Battle Necessity for my boy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (4 years old) begs & pleads disparately for this toy each and every time we go to Walmart. Got it here at a great price and because it was shipped it will be the biggest surprise he will receive for his coming birthday.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy but already defective.

The toy no longer has four of the five characters phrases. All I get is Jason's "Let's swing a right hook at him." You'd expect this to happen over a few years not months. Kind of disappointing.

product_meta.title: Power Rangers Movie Interactive Megazord with Ranger Figures
product_meta.description: The Power Rangers Interactive Movie Megazord is ready to take down evil! The Interactive Movie Megazord comes with five Power Rangers mini figures from the Power Rangers Movie for epic adventures. The feature loaded Interactive Megazord has eight features including: expandable wings, cannon and sword, battle and flight sounds, lights in the head and feet for enhanced realism, a light-up Morphin Grid, and five individual cockpits for each included ranger figure. Requires 3 AAA batteries (included).
feature_bullets: The Power Rangers Interactive Movie Megazord is ready to take down evil; features Lights and Sounds
The Interactive Movie Megazord comes with five Power Rangers mini figures from the Power Rangers Movie for epic adventures

The feature loaded Interactive Megazord has eight features including: expandable wings, cannon and sword, battle and flight sounds, lights in the head and feet for enhanced realism, a light-up Morphin Grid, and five individual cockpits for each included ranger figure
Take down evil with the Interactive Movie Megazord
The Power Rangers Interactive Movie Megazord requires 3 AAA batteries (included)
